text: A ia ni hanatu no ttiri iloo i te Jew, tana inoa ko Aquila. Ttama naa se tama ni haanau i Pontus, aa see rooroa koi raa, a ia ni hanake ma tana aavana, Priscilla, i Italy. Teenaa i te tuku i Rome, Claudius, ni mee tana taratara maa naa Jew raa ki hakattaha hakkaatoa Rome. Paul ni hanatu no mmata iloo i laaua,
